nodes.documentation: @dev ChaiOracle retrieves the price for Chai as the DSR fee from Pot
nodes.name: ChaiOracle

nodes.documentation:
@dev We update chi and retrieve it from pot as the price
 chai = (1/chi) * dai
 dai = chi * chai
 price = chi
nodes.name: price
